subtitle: By god’s nails, don’t let those prayers beat us
I know you’re a beginner, but I still think that it’s too easy
Jumping around like hell on wheels! Keep it cool, but not too much...
Don’t get too attached to this poor soul, if you do well, none will be left.
They had a family you know, the last one had a baby girl named Beatrice, nice
Well you are still alive, that’s something, maybe it’ll be easier to go on a rampage after killing the exorcists though
Ahah! I like the spirit of a free kill… but does it help you?
Why so serious? Those priest deserved it but live a little! kill a lot
You’re doing good ! maybe a bit too good now that I think of it
hm hm hm that’s nice stroll, don’t forget to take some time to yourself
I was thinking of having my horns trimmed, what do you think?
What a cute village *evil laugh*
You don't have enough mana yet
Welcome to your first assignement as a curse, the Village. Not the easiest time, the church is on high alert, give them Hell!

Soon none will stand in your way, to Hell they come

Do you feel this tingle in your nose? I think its your hair growing.
